synopsis.text:
Journey into the world of animation with our spirited protagonist, Mikiko Oguro, affectionately known as Kuromi, as she embarks on her dream career at the renowned Studio Petit. Inspired by the fictional anime 'Luis Monde III', Kuromi's passion for animation led her to graduate from the Greater Tokyo Animation Academy and secure her dream job. However, her dream quickly turns into a chaotic reality when she inherits the role of the head of production from her predecessor, who succumbs to stress-related illnesses.

With the daunting task of rallying a team of lackadaisical animators and completing 'Time Journeys Episode 2' within a week, Kuromi finds herself in a whirlwind of challenges. As the new leader of this eccentric team, she must navigate through the complexities of her new role and find a way to deliver the highly anticipated episode to fans worldwide. Will Kuromi's love for cartoons and her undying spirit be enough to turn the tide, or will the pressure lead to an even bigger catastrophe? Only time will tell in this thrilling ride through the world of anime production.
